cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid value 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent the CU gNB from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid value 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent the DU gNB from initializing properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌等級設定為無效值 'invalid_level' 會導致日誌配置錯誤，並阻止 DU gNB 正確初始化。
